title: Hour 1 - (06-26-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - (06-26-20)
description:
Dan talks about the Lebron Decision from 10 years ago. Dan says it changed the landscape on how players took control of their own narrative. Dan Says it made a lot of people uncomfortable.
